rComments: Very easy class to fulfill the CC  requirement. This class requires minimal effort to pass or get a decent grade in the class. One midterm, one research essay, and one final all due online. Attendance is required, but you can have a friend sign you in since he passes a sign-in sheet around.

Prof. Landau is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about his subject; his attitude is infectious. Attendance is mandatory but classes are always interesting and a pleasure to attend. There's a lot of reading but not much pressure to do it all; you can get by fine just by reading some of it.

Great class, learned about different kinds of Latin American music, saw cool documentaries, interesting discussions about social-political issues. Easy midterm exam and research paper, fun class outting to a concert. Thanks greg! I enjoyed your class!

One of the easiest classes I have taken. Everything is online, one midterm, one research paper, and one final, all extremely easy if you have the book. The only downside was the length of the class Wednesday nights and mandatory attendance. I left during breaks after signing in and received a 100 percent in this class, greg is awesome!

Major first-hand knowledge of music, and we got to go out to see music and discuss it. Thoughtful and deep debates about the socio-economic relevance of various musics from Latin America were enlightening and mind-expanding, great learnign experience.

He lectures deep into music history and throws out names/dates, but fails to explain relevance or context of the music. The research paper/midterms are not explained well, and confuses himself. Had to pay $10 to go to the midterm at a night club. (tuition is already enough!)
